SQL.LOAD: SELECT customer_name, document_num, certificate_num, amount, num_of_installments, name_on_card, card_num, card_security_code, card_expiration, card_type, auth_status, auth_num, reject_code, reject_msg, auth_date, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, dbs_company_code, dbs_product_code, dbs_system_code, dealer_code, email, mobile_area_code, mobile, phone_area_code, phone, warranty_sales_date, card_owner_tax_id, dbs_payment_type, due_date, expired_date, trans_ccauth_vscbrazil_id FROM elp_trans_ccauth_vscbrazil WHERE trans_ccauth_vscbrazil_id = :trans_ccauth_vscbrazil_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_trans_ccauth_vscbrazil SET customer_name = :customer_name, document_num = :document_num, certificate_num = :certificate_num, amount = :amount, num_of_installments = :num_of_installments, name_on_card = :name_on_card, card_num = :card_num, card_security_code = :card_security_code, card_expiration = :card_expiration, card_type = :card_type, auth_status = :auth_status, auth_num = :auth_num, reject_code = :reject_code, reject_msg = :reject_msg, auth_date = :auth_date, modified_by = :modified_by, dbs_company_code = :dbs_company_code, dbs_product_code = :dbs_product_code, dbs_system_code = :dbs_system_code, dealer_code = :dealer_code, email = :email, mobile_area_code = :mobile_area_code, mobile = :mobile, phone_area_code = :phone_area_code, phone = :phone, warranty_sales_date = :warranty_sales_date, card_owner_tax_id = :card_owner_tax_id, dbs_payment_type = :dbs_payment_type, due_date = :due_date, expired_date = :expired_date WHERE trans_ccauth_vscbrazil_id = :trans_ccauth_vscbrazil_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_trans_ccauth_vscbrazil ( customer_name, document_num, certificate_num, amount, num_of_installments, name_on_card, card_num, card_security_code, card_expiration, card_type, auth_status, auth_num, reject_code, reject_msg, auth_date, created_by, dbs_company_code, dbs_product_code, dbs_system_code, dealer_code, email, mobile_area_code, mobile, phone_area_code, phone, warranty_sales_date, card_owner_tax_id, dbs_payment_type, due_date, expired_date, trans_ccauth_vscbrazil_id ) VALUES ( :customer_name, :document_num, :certificate_num, :amount, :num_of_installments, :name_on_card, :card_num, :card_security_code, :card_expiration, :card_type, :auth_status, :auth_num, :reject_code, :reject_msg, :auth_date, :created_by, :dbs_company_code, :dbs_product_code, :dbs_system_code, :dealer_code, :email, :mobile_area_code, :mobile, :phone_area_code, :phone, :warranty_sales_date, :card_owner_tax_id, :dbs_payment_type, :due_date, :expired_date, :trans_ccauth_vscbrazil_id )
